enterprise.text_reprieve_days_left: %{days} days until end of grace period

trial.confirmation_info: We sent you an email on %{date} to %{email}. Please check your inbox and click the confirmation link provided to start your 14 days trial.
trial.email_not_received: You did not receive an email? You can resend the email with the link on the right.

form.domain_mismatch: The current request host name does not match the configured host name. Please double check your system settings.
form.general_consent: I agree with the terms of service and the privacy policy.
form.receive_newsletter: I want to receive the OpenProject newsletter.
form.taken_domain: There can only be one active trial per domain.
form.taken_email: Each user can only create one trial.

trial.quick_overview: Get a quick overview of project management and team collaboration with OpenProject Enterprise edition.
trial.resend_success: Email has been resent. Please check your emails and click the confirmation link provided.
trial.session_timeout: Your session timed out. Please try to reload the page or resend email.
trial.test_ee: Test the Enterprise edition 14 days for free
trial.try_another_email: Or try it with another email address.

benefits.description: What are the benefits of the Enterprise on-premises edition?
benefits.high_security_text: Single sign on (SAML, OpenID Connect, CAS), LDAP groups.
benefits.installation_text: Experienced software engineers guide you through the complete installation and setup process in your own infrastructure.
benefits.premium_features_text: Agile boards, custom theme and logo, graphs, intelligent workflows with custom actions, full text search for work package attachments and multi-select custom fields.
benefits.professional_support_text: Get reliable, high-touch support from senior support engineers with expert knowledge about running OpenProject in business-critical environments.

upsale.confidence: We deliver the confidence of a tested and supported enterprise-class project management software - with Open Source and an open mind.
upsale.enterprise_info_html: %{feature_title} is an Enterprise add-on.
upsale.text: The OpenProject Enterprise edition builds on top of the Community edition. It includes Enterprise add-ons and professional support mainly aimed at organizations with more than 10 users that manage business critical projects with OpenProject.
upsale.upgrade_info: Please upgrade to a paid plan to activate and start using it in your team.
upsale.you_contribute: Developers need to pay their bills, too. By upgrading to the Enterprise edition, you will be supporting this open source community effort and contributing to its development, maintenance and continuous improvement.

type_form.drag_to_activate: Potiahnite polia z tejto oblasti a aktivujte ich

work_packages_settings.warning_progress_calculation_mode_change: Changing progress calculation mode from work-based to status-based will result in all existing % Complete values to be lost and replaced with values associated with each status. Existing values for Remaining work may also be recalculated to reflect this change. This action is not reversible.

Changing progress calculation mode from status-based to work-based will make the % Complete field freely editable. If you optionally enter values for Work or Remaining work, they will also be linked to % Complete. Changing Remaining work can then update % Complete.

working_days.already_added_error: A non-working day for this date exists already. There can only be one non-working day created for each unique date.

calendar.empty_state_description: No specific non-working days are defined for this year. Click on "+ Non-working day" below to add a date.

working_days.change_description: Changing which days of the week are considered working days or non-working days can affect the start and finish days of all work packages in all projects in this instance.
working_days.removed_title: You will remove the following days from the non-working days list:
working_days.warning: The changes might take some time to take effect. You will be notified when all relevant work packages have been updated. Are you sure you want to continue?

attachments.delete_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this file? This action is not reversible.
attachments.draggable_hint: Pre vloženie obrázka alebo referenčnej prílohy presuňte súbor do editovateľného poľa. Uzavreté pole editora sa bude otvárať počas nepretržitého ťahania.
attachments.quarantined_hint: The file is quarantined, as a virus was found. It is not available for download.

avatars.empty_file_error: Please upload a valid image (jpg, png, gif)
avatars.text_upload_instructions:
Upload your own custom avatar of 128 by 128 pixels. Larger files will be resized and cropped to match.
A preview of your avatar will be shown before uploading, once you selected an image.
avatars.wrong_file_format: Allowed formats are jpg, png, gif

backup.attachments_disabled: Attachments may not be included since they exceed the maximum overall size allowed. You can change this via the configuration (requires a server restart).
backup.info: You can trigger a backup here. The process can take some time depending on the amount of data (especially attachments) you have. You will receive an email once it's ready.
backup.note: A new backup will override any previous one. Only a limited number of backups per day can be requested.
backup.title: Backup OpenProject

warning.no_member: This project currently does not have any members that can be added.

board_type.action_text: A board with filtered lists on %{attribute} attribute. Moving work packages to other lists will update their attribute.
board_type.action_text_assignee: Board with automated columns based on assigned users. Ideal for dispatching work packages.
board_type.action_text_status: Basic kanban style board with columns for status such as To Do, In Progress, Done.
board_type.action_text_subprojects: Board with automated columns for subprojects. Dragging work packages to other lists updates the (sub-)project accordingly.
board_type.action_text_subtasks: Board with automated columns for sub-elements. Dragging work packages to other lists updates the parent accordingly.
board_type.action_text_version: Board with automated columns based on the version attribute. Ideal for planning product development.
board_type.free_text: Start from scratch with a blank board. Manually add cards and columns to this board.
board_type.select_board_type: Please choose the type of board you need.

boards.error_attribute_not_writable: Cannot move the work package, %{attribute} is not writable.
boards.error_cannot_move_into_self: You can not move a work package into its own column.
boards.error_permission_missing: The permission to create public queries is missing
boards.text_hidden_list_warning: Not all lists are displayed because you lack the permission. Contact your admin for more information.

upsale.teaser_text: Would you like to automate your workflows with Boards? Advanced boards are an Enterprise add-on. Please upgrade to a paid plan.

tab_issue.empty: There are no issues linked yet. Link an existing issue by using the code OP#%{wp_id} (or PP#%{wp_id} for private links) in the issue title/description or create a new issue.

tab_mrs.empty: There are no merge requests linked yet. Link an existing MR by using the code OP#%{wp_id} (or PP#%{wp_id} for private links) in the MR title/description or create a new MR.

error.update_conflict_refresh: Click here to refresh the resource and update to the newest version.

standard.new_features_html:
The release brings various features and improvements for you, e.g.
  • Benefit from more flexible progress reporting – thanks to user feedback.
  • Receive an update notification with reload option for meetings.
  • Enable a custom field for multiple projects at once.
  • Use relative work package attribute macros.
  • Show empty lines in saved rich text.
  • See past meetings included in the number next to the Meetings tab.

new_features.learn_about: Learn more about the new features
new_features.text_new_features: Read about new features and product updates.

ical_sharing_modal.description: You can use the URL (iCalendar) to subscribe to this calendar in an external client and view up-to-date work package information from there.

ical_sharing_modal.warning: Please don't share this URL with other users. Anyone with this link will be able to view work package details without an account or password.

empty_state.no_notification: Looks like you are all caught up.

empty_state.no_notification_with_current_filter: Looks like you are all caught up for %{filter} filter.
empty_state.no_notification_with_current_project_fil: Looks like you are all caught up with the selected project.

no_results.at_all: New notifications will appear here when there is activity that concerns you.
no_results.with_current_filter: There are no notifications in this view at the moment

center.total_count_warning: Showing the %{newest_count} most recent notifications. %{more_count} more are not displayed.

upsale.description: With date alerts, you will be notified of upcoming start or finish dates so that you never miss or forget an important deadline.
upsale.title: Date alerts

settings.change_notification_settings: You can modify your notification settings to ensure you never miss an important update.

date_alerts.description: Automatic notifications when important dates are approaching for open work packages you are involved in (assignee, accountable or watcher).
date_alerts.teaser_text: With date alerts, you will be notified of upcoming start or finish dates so that you never miss or forget an important deadline.
date_alerts.title: Date alerts

delayed.description: Additional notifications for activities in all projects.
delayed.title: Non-participating

immediately.description: Notifications for all activities in work packages you are involved in (assignee, accountable or watcher).
immediately.title: Participating

project_specific.description: These project-specific settings override default settings above.
project_specific.title: Project-specific notification settings

mentioned.description: Receive a notification every time someone mentions me anywhere
mentioned.title: Mentioned

settings.title: Notification settings

backlogs.overview: Manage your work in the backlogs view.
backlogs.sprints: On the right you have the product backlog and the bug backlog, on the left you have the respective sprints. Here you can create epics, user stories, and bugs, prioritize via drag & drop and add them to a sprint.
backlogs.task_board:
The task board visualizes the progress for this sprint. Click on the plus (+) icon next to a user story to add new tasks or impediments.
The status can be updated by drag and drop.
backlogs.task_board_arrow: To see your task board, open the sprint drop-down...

boards.add: Click on the plus (+) icon to create a new card or add an existing card to the list on the board.
boards.drag:
Drag and drop your cards within a given list to reorder them, or to move them to another list.
You can click the info (i) icon in the upper right-hand corner or double-click a card to open its details.
boards.lists_basic: Here you can create multiple lists (columns) within your agile board.
boards.lists_kanban: Here you can create multiple lists (columns) within your board. This feature allows you to create a Kanban board, for example.
boards.overview: Select boards to shift the view and manage your project using the agile boards view.

steps.help_menu:
The Help (?) menu provides additional help resources. Here you can find a user guide, helpful how-to videos and more.
Enjoy your work with OpenProject!
steps.members: Invite new members to join your project.
steps.quick_add_button: Click on the plus (+) icon in the header navigation to create a new project or to invite coworkers.
steps.sidebar_arrow: Use the return arrow in the top left corner to return to the project’s main menu.

team_planner.add_assignee: To get started, add assignees to the team planner.
team_planner.add_existing: Search for existing work packages and drag them to the team planner to instantly assign them to a team member and define start and end dates.
team_planner.calendar: The weekly or biweekly planning board displays all work packages assigned to your team members.
team_planner.card: Drag work packages horizontally to move them backwards or forwards in time, drag the edges to change start and end dates and even drag them vertically to a different row to assign them to another member.
team_planner.overview: The team planner lets you visually assign tasks to team members and get an overview of who is working on what.

steps.welcome:
Urobte si tri minúty čas na úvodnú prehliadku, aby ste sa naučili čo najviac dôležité funkcie.
Doporučujeme dokončiť prehliadku až do konca. Prehliadku môžete kedykoľvek reštartovať.
steps.wiki: Within the wiki you can document and share knowledge together with your team.

wp.back_button: Use the return arrow in the top left corner to exit and return to the work package list.
wp.create_button: The + Create button will add a new work package to your project.
wp.full_view: The work package details view provides all the relevant information pertaining to a given work package, such as its description, status, priority, activities, dependencies, and comments.
wp.gantt_menu: Create project schedules and timelines effortlessly using the Gantt chart module.
wp.list:
This work package overview provides a list of all the work in your project, such as tasks, milestones, phases, and more.
Work packages can be created and edited directly from this view. To access the details of a particular work package, simply double-click its row.
wp.timeline: Here you can edit your project plan, create new work packages, such as tasks, milestones, phases, and more, as well as add dependencies. All team members can see and update the latest plan at any time.
wp.toggler: Now let's have a look at the work package section, which gives you a more detailed view of your work.

waiting_subtitle.network_on: Network is back. We are trying.
waiting_subtitle.timeout:
OpenProject could not provide you access to the project folder within the expected period of time. Please, try once again.

If that problem persists please contact your OpenProject administrator to check the health status of the file storage setup.

storages.drop_or_click_files: Drop files here or click to upload them to %{name}.

file_links.already_linked_directory: This directory is already linked to this work package.
file_links.already_linked_file: This file is already linked to this work package.
file_links.empty: Currently there are no linked files to this work package. Start linking files with the action below or from within %{storageType}.
file_links.link_uploaded_file_error: An error occurred linking the recently uploaded file '%{fileName}' to the work package %{workPackageId}.
file_links.remove_confirmation: Are you sure you want to unlink the file from this work package? Unlinking does not affect the original file and only removes the connection to this work package.

tooltip.not_logged_in: Please log in to the storage to access this file.
tooltip.view_not_allowed: You have no permission to see this file.

upload_error.403: Your file (%{fileName}) could not be uploaded due to system restrictions. Please contact your administrator for more information.
upload_error.413: Your file (%{fileName}) is bigger than what OpenProject can upload to %{storageType}. You can upload it directly to %{storageType} first and then link the file.
upload_error.507: Your file (%{fileName}) is bigger than the storage quota allows. Contact your administrator to modify this quota.
upload_error.default: Your file (%{fileName}) could not be uploaded.

detail.nextcloud: Please check that the latest version of the Nextcloud App "OpenProject Integration" is installed and contact your administrator for more information.

files.already_existing_body: A file with the name "%{fileName}" already exists in the location where you are trying to upload this file. What would you like to do?
files.directory_not_writeable: You do not have permission to add files to this folder.
files.dragging_folder: The upload to %{storageType} does not support folders.
files.dragging_many_files: The upload to %{storageType} supports only one file at once.
files.empty_folder_location_hint: Click the button below to upload the file to this location.
files.file_not_selectable_location: Selecting a file is not possible in the process of choosing a location.
files.managed_project_folder_no_access: You have no access yet to the managed project folder. Please wait a bit and try again.
files.managed_project_folder_not_available: The automatically managed project folder was not yet found. Please wait a bit, reload the page to fetch the newest data, and try again.
files.project_folder_no_access: You have no access to the project folder. Please, contact your administrator to get access or upload the file in another location.

information.connection_error: Some %{storageType} settings are not working. Please contact your %{storageType} administrator.
information.live_data_error_description: Some %{storageType} data could not be fetched. Please try to reload this page or contact your %{storageType} administrator.
information.no_file_links: In order to link files to this work package please do it via %{storageType}.
information.not_logged_in: To add a link, see or upload files related to this work package, please login to %{storageType}.

attribute_groups.upgrade_to_ee_text: Wow! If you need this add-on you are a super pro! Would you mind supporting us OpenSource developers by becoming an Enterprise edition client?

datepicker_modal.automatically_scheduled_parent: Automatically scheduled. Dates are derived from relations.
datepicker_modal.changing_dates_affects_follow_relations: Changing these dates will affect dates of related work packages.
datepicker_modal.manually_scheduled: Manual scheduling enabled, all relations ignored.
datepicker_modal.start_date_limited_by_relations: Available start and finish dates are limited by relations.

faulty_query.description: Tento pohľad je zlý a nemôže byť spracovaný.
faulty_query.title: Pracovný balíček nebolo možné načítať.

filters.baseline_incompatible: This filter attribute is not taken into consideration in Baseline mode.

hierarchy.children_expanded: Úroveň hierarchie %{level}, rozbalené. Kliknutím zbalíte filtrované podradené položky.

inline_create.title: Kliknutím sem pridajte nový pracovný balík do tohto zoznamu

jump_marks.label_content: Kliknite tu pre preskočenie menu a prejdite na obsah
jump_marks.label_pagination: Kliknite sem pre preskočenie tabuľky pracovných balíčkov a zobrazenie stránkovania

work_packages.label_column_multiselect: Kombinované rozbaľovacie pole: vyberte pomocou klávesov so šípkami, potvrďte stlačením ENTER, odstraňujte stlačením BACKSPACE
work_packages.limited_results: Only %{count} work packages can be shown in manual sorting mode. Please reduce the results by filtering, or switch to automatic sorting.
work_packages.message_error_during_bulk_delete: Chyba pri pokuse o odstránenie pracovných balíčkov.
work_packages.message_successful_show_in_fullscreen: Kliknutím sem otvoríte tento pracovný balík v zobrazení na celú obrazovku.
work_packages.message_view_spent_time: Zobraziť strávený čas pre tento pracovný balíček
work_packages.message_work_package_read_only: Pracovný balíček je v tomto stave uzamknutý. Nie je možné zmeniť iný atribút ako stav.
work_packages.message_work_package_status_blocked: Work package status is not writable due to closed status and closed version being assigned.

no_results.description: Nevytvorili sa žiadne alebo všetky pracovné balíky sú odfiltrované.
no_results.title: Žiadne pracovné balíčky na zobrazenie.

query.confirm_edit_cancel: Naozaj chcete zrušiť premenovanie tohto zobrazenia? Názov sa obnoví na poslednú uloženú hodnotu.

errors.duplicate_query_title: Zobrazenie s týmto názvom už existuje. Napriek tomu zmeniť?
errors.unretrievable_query: Nepodarilo sa načítať zobrazenie z adresy URL

query.group_by_disabled_by_hierarchy: Skupina je zakázaná v dôsledku aktívneho režimu hierarchie.
query.hierarchy_disabled_by_group_by: Režim hierarchie je zakázaný, pretože výsledky sú zoskupené podľa %{column}.
query.public_text: Publish this view, allowing other users to access your view. Users with the 'Manage public views' permission can modify or remove public query. This does not affect the visibility of work package results in that view and depending on their permissions, users may see different results.
query.star_text: Mark this view as favorite and add to the saved views sidebar on the left.

scheduling.is_parent: The dates of this work package are automatically deduced from its children. Activate 'Manual scheduling' to set the dates.
scheduling.is_switched_from_manual_to_automatic: The dates of this work package may need to be recalculated after switching from manual to automatic scheduling due to relationships with other work packages.

sharing.show_all_users: Show all users with whom the work package has been shared with
sharing.title: Share work package

upsale.description: Share work packages with users who are not members of the project.

table.summary: Tabuľka s riadkami pracovného balíka a so stĺpcami pracovného balíka atribútov.
table.text_inline_edit: Väčšina buniek tabuľky sú tlačidlá, ktoré aktivujú funkcionalitu inline editácie tohto atribútu.
table.text_select_hint: Výber polí by sa mal otvoriť pomocou klávesov "ALT" a šípkami.
table.text_sort_hint: Pomocou odkazov v záhlaví tabuľky môžete zoradiť, zoskupiť, rozmiestniť, odstrániť alebo pridať stĺpce.

table_configuration.columns_help_text: Use the input field above to add columns to your table view. You can drag and drop the columns to reorder them.
table_configuration.display_sums_hint: Zobraziť súčty všetkých sčitateľných atribútov v riadku pod tabuľkou výsledkov.
table_configuration.embedded_tab_disabled: This configuration tab is not available for the embedded view you are editing.
table_configuration.hierarchy_hint: Všetky filtrované výsledky z tabuľky budú rozšírené o ich predkov. Hierarchie je možné rozbaliť a zbaliť.

relation_filters.filter_work_packages_by_relation_type: Filter work packages by relation type

table_configuration.show_timeline_hint: Zobraziť interaktívny Ganttov graf na pravej strane tabuľky. Šírku môžete zmeniť pretiahnutím deliacej priečky medzi tabuľkou a Ganttovým diagramom.

sorting_mode.warning: You will lose your previous sorting when activating the automatic sorting mode.
